div.div: The 29 re-sequenced great tits and their demographic history.
div.p: ( a) Map of the sampling locations of the 29 re-sequenced great tits (black) and reference individual (red). ( b) Pairwise sequential Markovian coalescent analysis (PSMC) of the reference genome. The red line represents the average and the black lines indicate the confidence interval as determined by bootstrapping (100 Ã— ).
